name: The Obsessive Hunter: an OSR class
name_original: The Obsessive Hunter: an OSR class
description:
This character class has their own strict moral code, which they obsessively hate Monsters for not following. The most important thing in the world to this class is that these Monsters be destroyed for the afront they represent to their code, and they spend all possible time in thought and contemplation of the nature of Monsters, pursuing this. 

The Hunter's code is freeform, and the more complex it is, the more powerful the Hunter is. However, if the Hunter should violate any tenet of their code, they will lose that tenet, and it will weigh on them for all time. 

Comes with 11 powers available on level-up, with one chosen at first level.
